//Md. Ahsan Kabir Shohagh
#include<bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;
#define sz 100000
#define pb(a) push_back(a)
#define ll long long
#define ull unsigned long long
#define fread freopen("input.txt","r",stdin)
#define fwrite freopen("output.txt","w",stdout)
#define inf (1<<29)
#define mem(abc,z) memset(abc,z,sizeof(abc))
#define PI acos(-1)

int main(){
   int t,ans,n,m,s,p,q,viratPos,rohitPos;
   cin>>t;
   while(t--){
      cin>>n>>m>>s>>p>>q;
      ans=0;
      viratPos=1;
      rohitPos=1;
      while(s>0){
        viratPos=viratPos+p;
        if(viratPos<=n);
        else if(viratPos>n){
            viratPos-=n;
            viratPos=(viratPos-1)%(n-m+1)+m;
        }
        rohitPos=rohitPos+q;
        if(rohitPos<=n) ;
        else if(rohitPos>n){
            rohitPos-=n;
            rohitPos=(rohitPos-1)%(n-m+1)+m;
        }
        //cout<<viratPos<<" "<<rohitPos<<endl;
        if(viratPos==rohitPos) ans++;
        s--;
      }
      cout<<ans<<endl;
   }
   return 0;
}
/*
4
4 1 4 2 3
5 3 10 1 2
10 7 4 2 2
10 3 10 2 5
*/
